artist: Artist: Keith Rosson; Author: Abner Smith; Printer: Eberhardt Press, Portland; Publisher: Microcosm Publishing, Bloomington, Ind.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a helicopter landing on rural land printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 31 pp.
medium: Color offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The CIA Makes Science Fiction Unexciting, no. 4: The FBI Assassination of Puerto Rican independence leader Filiberto Ojeda Rios
